languages.text: "Тень, щит, клинок, а теперь еще кто — фаворитка? Для покорного инструмента ты слишком стараешься занять место, неподобающее слуге".

traits.locale_text: "Тень, щит, клинок, а теперь еще кто — фаворитка? Для покорного инструмента ты слишком стараешься занять место, неподобающее слуге".

languages.text: "Shield, shadow, blade, and now what else — a favourite? For an obedient weapon, you are too set on taking a place not fit for a servant."
languages.original_text: "Тень, щит, клинок, а теперь еще кто — фаворитка? Для покорного инструмента ты слишком стараешься занять место, неподобающее слуге".

traits.locale_text: "Shield, shadow, blade, and now what else — a favourite? For an obedient weapon, you are too set on taking a place not fit for a servant."
"Shield, shadow, blade, and now what else — a favourite? For an obedient weapon, you are too set on taking a place not fit for a servant."
"Shield, shadow, blade, and now what else — a favourite? For an obedient weapon, you are too set on taking a place not fit for a servant."
"Shield, shadow, blade, and now what else — a favourite? For an obedient weapon, you are too set on taking a place not fit for a servant."
"Shield, shadow, blade, and now what else — a favourite? For an obedient weapon, you are too set on taking a place not fit for a servant."
"Shield, shadow, blade, and now what else — a favourite? For an obedient weapon, you are too set on taking a place not fit for a servant."

languages.text: 「盾、影、刃、そして今度は何だ？お気に入りか？従順な武器のくせに、召使いの分際でふさわしくもない場所を手に入れようとしているとはな」
languages.original_text: "Shield, shadow, blade, and now what else — a favourite? For an obedient weapon, you are too set on taking a place not fit for a servant."

traits.locale_text: 「盾、影、刃、そして今度は何だ？お気に入りか？従順な武器のくせに、召使いの分際でふさわしくもない場所を手に入れようとしているとはな」

languages.text: "Schild, Schatten, Klinge und was jetzt noch — Liebschaft? Für eine gehorsame Waffe seid Ihr zu erpicht darauf, einen Platz einzunehmen, der einer Dienerin nicht zusteht."
languages.original_text: "Shield, shadow, blade, and now what else — a favourite? For an obedient weapon, you are too set on taking a place not fit for a servant."

traits.locale_text: "Schild, Schatten, Klinge und was jetzt noch — Liebschaft? Für eine gehorsame Waffe seid Ihr zu erpicht darauf, einen Platz einzunehmen, der einer Dienerin nicht zusteht."

languages.text: « Bouclier, ombre, lame et quoi d'autre, maintenant ? Favorite ? Pour une arme obéissante, vous êtes bien trop déterminée à occuper une place qui ne convient pas à une servante. »
languages.original_text: "Shield, shadow, blade, and now what else — a favourite? For an obedient weapon, you are too set on taking a place not fit for a servant."

traits.locale_text: « Bouclier, ombre, lame et quoi d'autre, maintenant ? Favorite ? Pour une arme obéissante, vous êtes bien trop déterminée à occuper une place qui ne convient pas à une servante. »

languages.text: «Escudo, sombra, cuchilla, ¿y ahora qué? ¿Favorita? Para dárselas de arma obediente, está usted empeñada en ocupar un lugar impropio de una sierva».
languages.original_text: "Shield, shadow, blade, and now what else — a favourite? For an obedient weapon, you are too set on taking a place not fit for a servant."

traits.locale_text: «Escudo, sombra, cuchilla, ¿y ahora qué? ¿Favorita? Para dárselas de arma obediente, está usted empeñada en ocupar un lugar impropio de una sierva».

languages.text: “坚盾、影子、利刃，接下来呢？是宠妾吗？你是一件听话的武器，而你渴望占据的这个位置，根本不是仆人应当觊觎的位置。”
languages.original_text: "Shield, shadow, blade, and now what else — a favourite? For an obedient weapon, you are too set on taking a place not fit for a servant."

traits.locale_text: “坚盾、影子、利刃，接下来呢？是宠妾吗？你是一件听话的武器，而你渴望占据的这个位置，根本不是仆人应当觊觎的位置。”

languages.text: "Kalkan, gölge, kılıç... Şimdi de sevgilisi mi olacaksın? Sadık bir silahtan ibaretsin, gözlerini bir hizmetkârın ulaşamayacağı yerlere dikme."
languages.original_text: "Shield, shadow, blade, and now what else — a favourite? For an obedient weapon, you are too set on taking a place not fit for a servant."

traits.locale_text: "Kalkan, gölge, kılıç... Şimdi de sevgilisi mi olacaksın? Sadık bir silahtan ibaretsin, gözlerini bir hizmetkârın ulaşamayacağı yerlere dikme."

languages.original_text: "Shield, shadow, blade, and now what else — a favourite? For an obedient weapon, you are too set on taking a place not fit for a servant."
